verses.t: Finally{G3063}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, rejoice{G5463} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}. To write{G1125} the same things{G846} to you{G5213}, to me{G1698} indeed{G3303} is not{G3756} grievous{G3636}, but{G1161} for you{G5213} it is safe{G804}.
Beware{G991} of dogs{G3588}, beware{G991} of{G2040} evil{G2556} workers{G2040}, beware{G991} of the concision{G3588}.

For{G1063} we{G2249} are{G2070} the circumcision{G3588}, which worship{G3000} God{G2316} in the spirit{G4151}, and{G2532} rejoice{G2744} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}, and{G2532} have{G3982} no{G3756} confidence{G3982} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561}.

Though{G2539} I{G1473} might{G2192} also{G2532} have{G2192} confidence{G4006} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561}. If{G1487} any{G5100} other{G243} man{G5100} thinketh{G1380} that he hath whereof he might trust{G3982} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561}, I{G1473} more{G3123}:

Circumcised{G4061} the eighth day{G3637}, of{G1537} the stock{G1085} of Israel{G2474}, of the tribe{G5443} of Benjamin{G958}, an Hebrew{G1445} of{G1537} the Hebrews{G1445}; as touching{G2596} the law{G3551}, a Pharisee{G5330};
Concerning{G2596} zeal{G2205}, persecuting{G1377} the church{G3588}; touching{G2596} the righteousness{G1343} which{G3588} is{G1096} in{G1722} the law{G3551}, blameless{G273}.
But{G235} what things{G3748} were{G2258} gain{G2771} to me{G3427}, those{G5023} I counted{G2233} loss{G2209} for{G1223} Christ{G3588}.

Yea{G235} doubtless{G3304}, and{G2532} I count{G2233} all things{G3956} but loss{G2209} for{G1223} the excellency{G5242} of the knowledge{G3588} of Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424} my{G3450} Lord{G3588}: for{G1223} whom{G3739} I have suffered the loss of{G2210} all things{G3956}, and{G2532} do count{G2233} them but dung{G4657}, that{G2443} I may win{G2770} Christ{G5547},

And{G2532} be found{G2147} in{G1722} him{G846}, not{G3361} having{G2192} mine own{G1699} righteousness{G1343}, which is{G3588} of{G1537} the law{G3551}, but{G235} that which is{G3588} through{G1223} the faith{G4102} of Christ{G5547}, the righteousness{G1343} which is{G3588} of{G1537} God{G2316} by{G1909} faith{G3588}:

That{G3588} I may know{G1097} him{G846}, and{G2532} the power{G3588} of{G3588} his{G846} resurrection{G386}, and{G2532} the fellowship{G3588} of{G3588} his{G846} sufferings{G3804}, being made conformable unto{G4833} his{G846} death{G3588};
If{G1487} by any means{G4459} I might attain{G2658} unto{G1519} the resurrection{G3588} of the dead{G3498}.

Not{G3756} as though{G3754} I had{G2983} already{G2235} attained{G2983}, either{G2228} were{G5048} already{G2235} perfect{G5048}: but{G1161} I follow after{G1377}, if{G1487} that{G2532} I may apprehend{G2638} that for{G1909} which{G3739} also{G2532} I am apprehended{G2638} of{G5259} Christ{G3588} Jesus{G2424}.

Brethren{G80}, I{G1473} count{G3049} not{G3756} myself{G1683} to have apprehended{G2638}: but{G1161} this one thing{G1520} I do, forgetting{G1950} those things which are{G3588} behind{G3694}, and{G1161} reaching forth{G1901} unto those things which are{G3588} before{G1715},
I press{G1377} toward{G2596} the mark{G4649} for{G1909} the prize{G3588} of the{G2821} high{G507} calling{G2821} of God{G3588} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}.

Let us{G5426} therefore{G3767}, as many as{G3745} be perfect{G5046}, be thus{G5124} minded{G5426}: and{G2532} if{G1487} in any thing{G5100} ye be{G5426} otherwise{G2088} minded{G5426}, God{G3588} shall reveal{G601} even{G2532} this{G5124} unto you{G5213}.
Nevertheless{G4133}, where{G3739}to{G1519} we have already attained{G5348}, let us walk{G4748}by the{G2583} same{G846} rule{G2583}, let us mind{G5426} the same thing{G846}.
Brethren{G80}, be{G1096} followers together{G4831} of me{G3450}, and{G2532} mark{G4648} them which walk{G4043} so as{G3779} ye have{G2192} us{G2248} for{G2531} an ensample{G5179}.

(For{G1063} many{G4183} walk{G4043}, of whom{G3739} I have told{G3004} you{G5213} often{G4178}, and{G1161} now{G3568} tell you{G3004} even{G2532} weeping{G2799}, that they are the enemies{G2190} of the cross{G3588} of Christ{G3588}:

Whose{G3739} end{G3588} is destruction{G684}, whose{G3739} God{G3588} is their belly{G3588}, and{G2532} whose glory{G3588} is in{G1722} their{G846} shame{G3588}, who{G3588} mind{G5426} earthly things{G1919}.)
For{G1063} our{G2257} conversation{G3588} is{G5225} in{G1722} heaven{G3772}; from{G1537} whence{G3739} also{G2532} we look{G553} for the Saviour{G4990}, the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}:

Who{G3739} shall change{G3345} our{G2257} vile{G3588} body{G3588}, that{G1519} it{G846} may be{G1096} fashioned like unto{G4832} his{G846} glorious{G3588} body{G3588}, according to{G2596} the working{G3588} whereby{G3588} he{G846} is able{G1410} even{G2532} to subdue{G5293} all things{G3956} unto himself{G1438}.
